analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ATFCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol#1067-1076):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	- MintableToken(address(token)).mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	- MintableToken(address(token)).mint(_ecosystemFund,tokensForEcosystem) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	- MintableToken(address(token)).mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	- MintableToken(address(token)).mint(_operationsFund,tokensForOperations) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	- endSale() (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleConcluded (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
_stage in ATFCrowdsale.setCrowdsaleStage (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol#1036-1038) is a local variable never initialiazed

ATFCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol#1067-1076) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(address(token)).mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	-MintableToken(address(token)).mint(_ecosystemFund,tokensForEcosystem) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	-MintableToken(address(token)).mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	-MintableToken(address(token)).mint(_operationsFund,tokensForOperations) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)

Reentrancy in ATFCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol#1067-1076):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensForEcosystem (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol#788-803) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol#796)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol#814-822) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/28/0x5b7b8ad7493131bc16ac41edaaeeb9234db42be2.sol#819-822)
